messages.messageBody:
,

Hi,

It looks like they're finally going to release Shogun on DVD...I
signed up to a let me know when/if thing some time ago and it
finally whent ping...late September apparently.

Regards

Howard

Howard

------------------------------------------------------------

*price and availability are subject to change.
